鄉.definition: country or countryside; native place; home village or town; township (PRC administrative unit)

鄉人子.definition: young fellow countryman; young person from the same village

鄉土.definition: native soil; one's native land; one's hometown; local (to an area)

鄉城.definition: Xiangcheng county (Tibetan: phyag 'phreng rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)

鄉城縣.definition: Xiangcheng county (Tibetan: phyag 'phreng rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)

鄉寧.definition: Xiangning county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi

鄉寧縣.definition: Xiangning county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi

鄉民.definition: villager; (Tw) (Internet slang) person who likes to follow online discussions and add their opinions

鄉紳.definition: a scholar or government official living in one's village; a village gentleman; squire

鄉親.definition: fellow countryman (from the same village); local people; villager; the folks back home

鄉試.definition: the triennial provincial imperial exam during the Ming and Qing

鄉貫.definition: one's native place; place of ancestry; registered birthplace

鄉醫.definition: abbr. of 鄉村醫生|乡村医生[xiang1 cun1 yi1 sheng1]

鄉長.definition: village chief; mayor (of village or township)

鄉音.definition: local accent; accent of one's native place
